Cell.Data: Ballistic Machinegun: Machineguns fire long bursts that can inflict heavy damage and are excellent for suppressing enemies. However, a burst consumes 80%% of the soldier's TU to fire - limiting the mobility of the weapon. They are also Heavy weapons, meaning a strong soldier is needed to use them effectively. They use the lower of ACC and STR to determine accuracy and an additional penalty is incurred if the soldier has less than 70 STR (due to the 70 Recoil). Range: 25 Damage: 30 Kinetic Suppression: 40 Snap / 120 Burst Mitigation: 5 Ammo Capacity: 10 x 3 shots Reaction Modifier: 0.5x Recoil: 70 Recoil Reload Cost: 35 TU Fire Modes: - 45%% TU 50 Acc x 3 shots - 80%% TU 35 Acc x 9 shots

Scatter Laser: Machineguns fire long bursts that can inflict heavy damage and are excellent for suppressing enemies. However, a burst consumes 80%% of the soldier's TU to fire - limiting the mobility of the weapon. They are also Heavy weapons, meaning a strong soldier is needed to use them effectively. They use the lower of ACC and STR to determine accuracy and an additional penalty is incurred if the soldier has less than 70 STR (due to the 70 Recoil). Range: 25 Damage: 45 Energy Suppression: 45 Snap / 135 Burst Mitigation: 8 Ammo Capacity: 10 x 3 shots Reaction Modifier: 0.5x Recoil: 70 Recoil Reload Cost: 35 TU Fire Modes: - 45%% TU 50 Acc x 3 shots - 80%% TU 35 Acc x 9 shots

Plasma Caster: Machineguns fire long bursts that can inflict heavy damage and are excellent for suppressing enemies. However, a burst consumes 80%% of the soldier's TU to fire - limiting the mobility of the weapon. They are also Heavy weapons, meaning a strong soldier is needed to use them effectively. They use the lower of ACC and STR to determine accuracy and an additional penalty is incurred if the soldier has less than 70 STR (due to the 70 Recoil). Range: 25 Damage: 70 Energy Suppression: 50 Snap / 150 Burst Mitigation: 12 Ammo Capacity: 10 x 3 shots Reaction Modifier: 0.5x Recoil: 70 Recoil Reload Cost: 35 TU Fire Modes: - 45%% TU 50 Acc x 3 shots - 80%% TU 35 Acc x 9 shots

MAGSTORM: Machineguns fire long bursts that can inflict heavy damage and are excellent for suppressing enemies. However, a burst consumes 80%% of the soldier's TU to fire (unless paired with Predator armour) - limiting the mobility of the weapon. They are also Heavy weapons, meaning a strong soldier is needed to use them effectively. They use the lower of ACC and STR to determine accuracy and an additional penalty is incurred if the soldier has less than 70 STR (due to the 70 Recoil). Range: 25 Damage: 105 Kinetic Suppression: 55 Snap / 165 Burst Mitigation: 18 Ammo Capacity: 10 x 3 shots Reaction Modifier: 0.5x Recoil: 70 Recoil Reload Cost: 35 TU Fire Modes: - 45%% TU 50 Acc x 3 shots - 80%% TU 35 Acc x 9 shots
